jd: From: Praveen Kumar, Magicforce praveen@magicforce.us Reply to: praveen@magicforce.us Job Title: Azure DeveloperLocation: RemoteDuration: 2+ monthsJob Description:Mandatory skillsAPI Management, Logic apps, Functions apps, Azure storage(blob), Azure secret/certificates, API Authentication/AuthorizationGood to have skills: -Azure with Salesforce Integrations, Liquid files, Azure DevOps CI/CD4+ years of experience with Azure Integration Services using Logic Apps, API Management and Azure storage (Blob)Knowledge of Azure DevOps CI/CD implementation is good to have.Develop and maintain innovative Azure solutions.The ability to automate tasks and deploy production standard code (continuous integration, API versioning etc.)Create APIM endpoint for every third-party service call from CLS and implement the logic using Logic app. Implement the authentication using token-based service.Establish the connection between CLS and third-party service using azure secret. Also able to test the end point from Postman whenever required.
